redacted_input: Validate these rules and identify conflicts

assumptions: User wants to validate business rules or constraints.
System context may be partial; clarify missing inputs.
steps: Extract rules and define them in a consistent schema.
Check for contradictions and missing branches.
Propose targeted test cases for risk areas.
Return a structured risk report + next actions.
required_inputs: Rules/constraints in a structured form (or examples)
Edge cases or known failures (if any)
